trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Contiene gli stili per i bordi delle celle di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllo consente di personalizzare completamente l'aspetto, inclusi i bordi delle celle e delle intestazioni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> le proprietà che consentono di impostare l'aspetto del bordo della cella.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se è necessario personalizzare ulteriormente i bordi, la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> classe consente di impostare lo stile del bordo per i singoli lati delle celle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> le proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> rappresentano il sinistro, destro, superiore e il bordo inferiore di una cella, rispettivamente.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare queste proprietà nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> per ottenere diversi per i bordi tra le celle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adjusts the cell borders of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> so that a double border separates the interior cells and the top left header cell from the row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente consente di regolare i bordi delle celle di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> in modo che un bordo doppio separa le celle interne e la cella superiore sinistra dell'intestazione da intestazioni di riga e colonna.

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio viene illustrato come eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> metodi e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: These members use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objects to modify individual cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzano questi membri <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> oggetti per modificare i singoli bordi delle celle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo del costruttore.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> Cenni preliminari sulla classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del bordo per tutti i bordi di una cella.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> non vengono impostate proprietà per lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> valore, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> valore della proprietà è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato al momento dell'impostazione della proprietà non è un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> valido.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato durante l'impostazione di questa proprietà è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance was retrieved through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato al momento dell'impostazione della proprietà è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> e questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> è stata recuperata mediante la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del bordo inferiore di una cella.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato è uguale all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> and the values for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> properties are equal to their counterpart in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il parametro <paramref name="other" /> è una proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> e i valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> sono uguali alla loro controparte nella proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Viene usato come funzione hash per un tipo specifico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> corrente.

trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stile del bordo sinistro di una cella.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto che è una copia dell'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Copia dell'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.ICloneable>.

trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta la proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> metodo restituisce una stringa che include i valori per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> proprietà.
